bike.frame_model: Stumpjumper FSR Carbon EVO 29 LTD Frame
bike.description: FACT IS 9m carbon front triangle, 29" EVO geometry, M5 alloy rear triangle, tapered HT, PF30 BB, ISCG ’05, internal Command Post routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 135mm travel

components.description: Custom FOX Float CTD Factory with AUTOSAG and Boost Valve, Climb, Trail, Descend settings w/Trail and rebound adj., 194x46mm
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post BlackLite, 3 position, adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head 30.9mm, S:100mm travel, Others: 125mm travel
Command Post 34.9mm clamp, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual, Mylar DT protector
